# Akhilam Industries - LLMs.txt

## About
Akhilam Industries is a leading industrial manufacturer located in Vatva, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. We specialize in producing high-quality crane components and industrial automation solutions.

## Services
- Industrial Manufacturing Services Ahmedabad
- Custom Industrial Solutions Ahmedabad
- Industrial Fabrication Services Ahmedabad
- Heavy Industry Services Ahmedabad
- Industrial Product Manufacturer Gujarat

## Location
53, Shankheshwar Industrial Park, nr. Vatva Railway Over Bridge Road, Vinoba Bhave Nagar, Dibiyapur, Phase I, Vatva, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 382445

- Phone: +91 97129 77761, +91 90161 95212

- Website: https://akhilamindustries.com
